Path of Least Resistance.name: Path of Least Resistance
Path of Least Resistance.fullText:
Tharashk Wayfinder Attack 11Path of Least Resistance

The power of your dragon mark guides your strike, and its magic lingers in the wound, weakening your foe’s defenses.

Encounter        Weapon
Standard Action      Melee or Ranged weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. lowest of Fortitude, Reflex, or Will (melee) or Dexterity vs. lowest of Fortitude, Reflex, or Will (ranged)

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged). Until the start of your next turn, the target takes a -2 penalty to the defense you hit.


Published in Eberron Player's Guide, page(s) 77.
Path of Least Resistance.flavor: The power of your dragon mark guides your strike, and its magic lingers in the wound, weakening your foe’s defenses.
Path of Least Resistance.attack: Strength vs. lowest of Fortitude, Reflex, or Will (melee) or Dexterity vs. lowest of Fortitude, Reflex, or Will (ranged)
Path of Least Resistance.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged). Until the start of your next turn, the target takes a -2 penalty to the defense you hit.

Distant Quarry.name: Distant Quarry
Distant Quarry.fullText:
Tharashk Wayfinder Utility 12Distant Quarry

Your dragon mark pulses with energy as you identify a distant foe as your quarry.

Encounter  
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You designate one enemy that you can see as your quarry.


Published in Eberron Player's Guide, page(s) 77.
Distant Quarry.flavor: Your dragon mark pulses with energy as you identify a distant foe as your quarry.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: You designate one enemy that you can see as your quarry.
Distant Quarry.effect: You designate one enemy that you can see as your quarry.

Path of Destruction.name: Path of Destruction
Path of Destruction.fullText:
Tharashk Wayfinder Attack 20Path of Destruction

Your dragon mark flashes as you deliver a devastating attack. You then take a couple of steps and unleash another crippling assault.

Daily        Weapon
Standard Action      Melee or Ranged weapon

Primary Target: One creature

Primary Attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged). The target gains vulnerable 1 to all damage until the end of the encounter.

Effect: Shift 2 squares and make a secondary attack.

  Secondary Target: One creature

  Secondary Attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)

  Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged). The secondary target gains vulnerable 1 to all damage until the end of the encounter. If you hit the same creature with both the primary and secondary attacks, it gains vulnerable 2 to all damage until the end of the encounter.


Published in Eberron Player's Guide, page(s) 77.
Path of Destruction.flavor: Your dragon mark flashes as you deliver a devastating attack. You then take a couple of steps and unleash another crippling assault.
Path of Destruction.attack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)
Path of Destruction.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged). The target gains vulnerable 1 to all damage until the end of the encounter.
Path of Destruction.effect: Shift 2 squares and make a secondary attack.
Path of Destruction.secondaryAttack: Strength vs. AC (melee) or Dexterity vs. AC (ranged)
Path of Destruction.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage (melee) or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage (ranged). The secondary target gains vulnerable 1 to all damage until the end of the encounter. If you hit the same creature with both the primary and secondary attacks, it gains vulnerable 2 to all damage until the end of the encounter.
